column4: doesn anyone here run a ununtu server, so if i run into trouble they can maybe help me ^^
lots of people run Ubuntu as some sort of server
I use it as server too :)
if you want to run both the gui and some services, you should just use the standard install
if you want a machine without GUI, type server as boot option
then you'll just have to install the services you want :D

then you'll just have to aptitude install apache2 after the thing has setup the base systen
the command 'aptitude install apache2' will install apache 2
